title: How to Send a Zoom Invitation

steps.title: Open Zoom and join a meeting.
steps.content: Open Zoom and join a meeting . This application icon looks like a video camera inside a blue circle that you can find in your Start menu or in the Applications folder in Finder.

steps.title: Click Participants.
steps.content: Click Participants . It's with an icon that looks like two people centered at the bottom of your screen.

steps.title: Click Invite.
steps.content: Click Invite . This icon is located in the bottom right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Choose Email or Copy Invitation.
steps.content: Choose Email or Copy Invitation . The option for "Copy invitation" will copy the entire meeting's detailed information and invitation whereas "Copy Invite Link" will only copy the URL for the meeting. If you choose "Email," you'll next have to choose which email service you'd like to use (the default email you have set up, Gmail, or Yahoo). When you choose an email service, you'll be prompted to log in, then an auto-generated email (containing the Zoom meeting's invitation) will open for you to add recipients to in order to share the meeting link. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Share your copied invite.
steps.content: Share your copied invite. You can paste that invite in an email or in a Facebook Message with your friends so they can join the meeting.

steps.title: Open Zoom and join or host a meeting.
steps.content: Open Zoom and join or host a meeting. This application icon looks like a video camera inside a blue circle that you can find on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap Participants.
steps.content: Tap Participants . It's with an icon that looks like two people centered at the bottom of your screen. If you don't see this icon immediately, you may have to tap your screen.

steps.title: Click Invite.
steps.content: Click Invite . This icon is located in the bottom right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Select to invite via email.
steps.content: Select to invite via email. If you have the Gmail app installed, you'll see that as an option as well as your default email app. When you select either of these, you'll see a pre-generated invitation to your meeting. Enter the email addresses of who you want to send the invitations to and tap Send .

steps.title: Go to https://www.zoom.com and sign in.
steps.content: Go to https://www.zoom.com and sign in. Click Sign in in the top right corner and enter your credentials or click to use Facebook, Google, or SSO to sign in.

steps.title: Click Meetings.
steps.content: Click Meetings . You'll see this in the vertical menu on the left side of the page if you're using a web browser.

steps.title: Click the meeting you want to share.
steps.content: Click the meeting you want to share. The "Upcoming" tab should automatically load with all your scheduled upcoming meetings.

steps.title: Click Copy Invitation.
steps.content: Click Copy Invitation . It's to the right of the "Invite Link" header on the website.

steps.title: Click Copy Meeting Invitation.
steps.content: Click Copy Meeting Invitation . This will copy all the information in the text box to your clipboard.

steps.title: Share your copied invite.
steps.content: Share your copied invite. You can paste that invite in an email or in a Facebook Message with your friends so they can join the meeting. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Open Zoom.
steps.content: Open Zoom. This application icon looks like a video camera inside a blue circle that you can find in your Start menu or in the Applications folder in Finder.

steps.title: Click Meetings.
steps.content: Click Meetings . You'll see this in the horizontal menu at the top of the window.

steps.title: Click Copy Invitation.
steps.content: Click Copy Invitation . The entire invitation will be copied to your clipboard.

steps.title: Share your copied invite.
steps.content: Share your copied invite. Paste that invite in an email or in a Facebook Message with your friends so they can join the meeting. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Open Zoom.
steps.content: Open Zoom. This application icon looks like a video camera inside a blue circle that you can find on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap Meetings.
steps.content: Tap Meetings . You'll see this in the horizontal menu that runs along the bottom of your screen next to an icon of a clock.

steps.title: Tap the meeting you want to invite people to.
steps.content: Tap the meeting you want to invite people to. The meeting's details will load in a new page.

steps.title: Tap Invite.
steps.content: Tap Invite . You'll see this below the blue "Start" button.

steps.title: Tap Email.
steps.content: Tap Email . If you have a specific email app installed, you'll see it here and you can select it. If you send an email, you'll send the entire invitation instead of just the link. Enter the recipient's emails and tap Send .
